description: Dashboard for Micrometer instrumented applications (Java, Spring Boot, Micronaut)

panels.title: Sum of the duration of every request

panels.description:
Add this to your application.properties first:
quarkus.datasource.metrics.enabled=true

panels.description:

panels.title: Connection pool over last [1m]

panels.description:
Add this to your application.properties first:
quarkus.datasource.metrics.enabled=true
panels.title: Timing over last [1m]

targets.expr: sum by(level) (count_over_time({job="$app", level=~"$level"} |= `$search` | auth_tenant =~ "^$tenant$" and auth_login =~"^$login$" and auth_nome =~"^$usuario$" and traceId =~"^$traceId$" [$__interval]   ))

sum by(level) (count_over_time({job="$app", level=~"$level"} |= `$search` | auth_tenant =~ "^$tenant$" and auth_login =~"^$login$" and auth_nome =~"^$usuario$" and traceId =~"^$traceId$" [$__interval]   ))
{job="$app", level=~"$level"} |= `$search` | auth_tenant =~ "^$tenant$" and auth_login =~"^$login$" and auth_nome =~"^$usuario$" and traceId =~ "^$traceId$"

title: Telemetria - Plataforma Educar
